wikipedia_page.main: Sir Alan Fraser Wilkie (born 26 December 1947), styled The Honourable Mr Justice Wilkie, is a former British judge and barrister. He retired on 31 January 2017.

response: In 2002, Wilkie published his autobiography, "One Night at the Palace: A Referee's Story", co-written with George Miller."One Night at the Palace: A Referee's Story" : Alan Wilkie, written with George Miller, Parrs Wood Press 2002. : Football-Books.com website.
*†One Night at the Palace: A Referee's Story, Alan Wilkie & George Miller, Parrs Wood Press 2002,
